title: Thank you OCE Community!
body:
I depart on Dec 3rd to America (permanently) and thus will be moving to NA server. Thanks for such a great time OCE! It's been a really cool 3 years ever since the Oceanic server became a thing.

All the best to you guys! I might still hang around OCE Boards but most likely will move to mainly contributing to the NA Boards.

Thank you everyone!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Well, no matter where you post...
Or where you go...
We'll always be here for you :)

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y3xsXmEs,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-11-28T21:12:38.535+0000)
>
> We'll always be here for you :)

OMFG OMFG OMFG
DAS COOL BOI

How RP did u use up for the three comments xD

still cool doe
He just has accounts on most regions :P
Not gunna lie Wuks... that was pretty cool!

NA is filth do not step foot on NA boards my mans

other than that enjoy urself
NA? Oh dear god I pray that you stay safe

Thanks, I appreciate it :)
Don't worry though, I know how to defend myself against toxicity
by hugging turret? :D
Well ever since that new mastery came out turret hugging seems like the next best thing

Good luck!

The OCE community may not be the Kindest bunch, but at least it's tight-knit, we all kind of have each others backs when it's needed. 

So you're always welcome here!

Have fun in America, the land of the free (and the walled in)
Made it! Now I can enjoy Twisted Treeline whenever I want :D
GL HF, show NA what a true {{champion:91}} is capable of

Oh god someone's been stalking my match history....

I'm just an ultimate filthy casual player, the only reason why I play Talon so much is because of how fun the rework made him; fits my playstyle entirely.

But yeah it's been a blast! Knowing I was one of the first people on the Oceanic server is really cool. I only have one question though I was going to send to Riot Support but I might as well ask you now.
So apparently when you transfer to a new server you can choose a new summoner name (I don't remember what it was when I came over to Oceanic Server 3 years ago). I want to change it back to 'airaze' which I started off with back in late S2 and I was thinking whether that name will be available when I get back there. For example right now I can search up 'airaze' on LoLKing and it'll show up my old account back on NA server; will that name be available for me to change to? Considering it's already 3 years old and inactive.

Thanks Maraudaur!

{{champion:91}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:91}}
Sorry man I'm not sure, player support is still the best place for that.
Aight no worries, I'll send them a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Evirtua,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y3xsXmEs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-28T08:04:49.081+0000)
whether that name will be available
>


Did a quick check for you, that name should now be available to use from the 28/6/15, which was well over a year ago, so you're all good on that front. Although, I'm not sure if you will be given the name change option, as (if i remember correctly) its only given to you if your name is already taken, which did a scan again) it is not, so you might have to invest a little extra to get that name change, although do save that RP buy (if you do) until you're in America, because as was previously stated rito games loves NA and as such they get a much better price (yes their currency is worth more, (but even so we earn our currency at the same rate, cash hogs) cashing in at 24% more than we get.

If you didn't bother reading that TDLR: **Both your names are available on NA**

Also, Trump is a criminal, don't like him by any means, he got elected mainly through empty lies.
----

Also, don't forget your inflatable Kangaroo, Americans are fascinated by those. Not even kidding seen it before some random Aussie thought it would be funny to hop around on a blow up roo in America, all the residents came out and even some of the kids said thing along the lines of "Look ma, they do ride kangaroo's" Funny people, even if they are a bit wacky on their decision making (Trump. Still have guns.).

Okay. 
Just a phew heads up:

1) Donald Trump is President
2) The killing (via shooting) is high
3) OCE is toxic and crap, but NA is much worse.
4) Riot cares about the NA server, so lucky you :D
5) Pray to God you don't get fucked asap.

And from me personally:
I HOPE YOU HAVE FUN IN NA AND WE PROBS MISS YO ASS ;-;
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

1 - Not to get into politics but I actually don't mind Trump
2 - I'll be sure to stay in safer neighborhoods 
3 - I'll be sure not to join that group, I should be able to handle myself against toxicity
4 - Yeah, it's been an ongoing gag that 'nobody takes the Oceanic server seriously' xD I sure am going to enjoy permanent Twisted Treeline!
5 - On League or literally? Either way I'll be sure to watch myself haha

Thanks a ton! I should still hang around the OCE Boards but obviously I won't be on as much :)
I'll be under my very first name from back in S2, 'airaze' (if I manage to get that name there)

Wow.... 
I ever tried to log onto NA server in Australia and....it's like 150+ ms ping xDDDD...but that was like 6 months ago..
Be sure to come visit us some time matey. You're always more than welcome back! ; )
Gl lad

Dude I need your help, please help me report this guy

_Picture Removed_

Because I can't create a topic

**Evirtua** is right, you need to take a report like that through [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

If you are having trouble making a ticket get in touch with me in-game or in Discord (Tele#0343), and we can sort something out.

I really don't know why you posted this here since it has nothing to do with me but you are breaking a well known rule of the Boards and that is to name and shame.

Please remove that screenshot.

Also calling someone 'trash' is quite light for toxicity and isn't much of a concern. "fkn %%%gott' isn't that serious either.
